_comment: Created by NCODowd on 24/05/2016 16:31:59 using v2.7
title: Did people feel they were given enough time to discuss their needs and treatment?
analysis_commentary: The proportion of people who felt they had enough time to discuss their condition/needs or treatment has decreased over time: falling from 93% in 2010 to 89% in 2015. The question was changed in 2013 to ask about needs and treatment rather than condition and treatment.
data_source: Care Quality Commission, Community Mental Health Survey
